title: OOK Glazing Push Points, Glazier Points, Steel, Zinc Finish (45 Piece)
description: The OOK Glazier Points are used for holding glass when refurbishing or building a window or mirror. The durable steel material features a zinc plated finish for longevity and rust resistance. The glazing push points are made for an easy push-in application - all that is needed is a putty knife for installation (not included). 45 pieces per package. Package includes instructions.
